title: Does a turrets health depends on enemies in the game?
body:
Reading the [Lol Wiki](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Turret), it says that towers have +200 health for each enemy champion.
Does that mean if you have a DC towers are weaker?

edit: turret's

replies.body:
"+200 health for each enemy champion in the game. "

In other words, customs modify them based on the amount of people each team has.

Oh nice!
So if I wanted a 3v3 on SR then the outers would have 1000 + 3*200  = 1600  rather than a 5v5 with 1000+ 5*200 = 2000
just use your common sense. and you want to be a rioter. with posts like this lmeo ull be lucky to be the water boy

Common sense tells me I do not know the whether "enemy champions" means players connected in the game, players prescribed from loading, or players the map intended. I was curious to find exactly which one this was referring to. While I could experiment by loading customs by myself, this was easier :).
